author: potuz
content: The CL will get a series of bytes, read the first byte, to find the type of object and then deserialize that object.

author: lightclient
content: My PR doesn’t send bytes, it sends a json object with a type field

author: lightclient
content: so not quite sure what you’re referring to

author: potuz
content: Yeah in this case it means extracting the type from the type field and then deciding with object to create from the JSON
